name: Geometry Challenge 2D
description:
Geometry Challenge is a puzzle game with arcade elements. Your task is modify environment by moving, rotating and destroying its elements - in that way you have to lead soul to the exit.

Features:
- Puzzle game with arcade elements
- rotating, moving and destroying environment
- planning phase - planning and preparing environment before start the game
- possibility to make changes in the real time
- over 45 levels
- simple 2D graphics
